context_bundle.summary: Lead Management Pattern: Multi-source capture (web, events, content, social) -> Lead scoring (demographic 30% + behavioral 40% + engagement 20% + predictive 10%) -> Intelligent routing (Hot 80-100: immediate SMS+email to rep, Warm 60-79: daily call list, Cold 40-59: nurture campaign) -> Personalized nurturing (content by industry/stage) -> Sales enablement package. 25%->38% conversion. $11.3M/yr value.

onboarding.quick_start: 1. Capture all sources to CRM. 2. Score: Demo (company size, title, industry) + Behavior (pages, downloads, events) + Engagement (frequency, recency). 3. Hot leads: 5-min response via SMS. 4. Nurture by segment. 5. Auto-create sales intel package.
common_patterns: Hot 80-100: SMS+email in 5min, assign rep, high-priority task
Behavioral triggers: Pricing page -> ROI calc, Case study -> related stories
Re-score monthly, recalibrate quarterly on conversion data
known_errors: Score calibration needs quarterly adjustment on win/loss data
Behavioral tracking requires proper UTM/cookie setup
Nurture content library needs ongoing refresh
CRM data quality limits scoring accuracy
